reasoning: Aspirin-Induced Asthma (AERD) is a specific subtype affecting 4-11% of asthmatic population. Prevalence estimated at ~1.2% of general population (1,200 per 100k) based on asthma prevalence rates and AERD penetrance. Limited population-based epidemiological data available; most studies are hospital-based or asthma registry subgroups.
source: Micromedex drug information database; clinical prevalence estimates from asthma registries
